200 [ICON_GOLD] Gold Coins [NewLine] A Little Effort to Achieve a Great Effort: The damage multiplier of "Drunken Flowers, Moon and Clouds" is increased to 150%, [NewLine] The vulnerability multiplier of "Bound Clothes" is increased to 60%

300 [ICON_GOLD] coins [NewLine] Drink more hot water: +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement, automatically recover 15 health points at the end of the round, [NewLine] this effect is improved when you are near a water source at the beginning of the round, and this effect is improved when you are near a volcano, [NewLine] this effect is greatly improved when you are near both
400 [ICON_GOLD] coins [NewLine] Steady Arc Barrier: After using "Drunken Flower Moon Cloud Turn", restore 50% of lost health and enter the "Steady Arc Barrier" state
500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold Coins [NewLine] Childlike innocence: Able to launch nuclear bombs, produce and purchase Yuou "01NG VI" and get a nuclear bomb for free

"Eight Sounds of Ganzhou" is ready [NewLine] Current savings [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]
Will cause 50 damage to enemy units within 1 grid area and apply "binding"
Will cause 99 damage to enemy units within 2 squares and apply "binding"
Citizen, your case has been accepted.
If you are willing to assist, it will be a great help to me.
Young people should pay attention to their health and drink more hot water.
Although your life is not in danger, please do not resist arrest...
The termites are trembling with fear, and the sky is dark and gloomy.
As for matters of life and death, "01NG VI Detective Yuou", a high-end model of Bomb that is actually just a little more complicated in function, he himself does not actually have any obsession.
Unexpectedly, this citizen was interested in this kind of thing.
Ha. Ha. Let's just forget about such trivial matters.
Hello~ Excuse me, "If you have any problem, please contact the Public Security Bureau" point-to-point community service, please open the door?~
The preciousness of life lies precisely in this irreplaceable nature. [NEWLINE] (Condemn you)
Low power mode, please tap on the shoulder to wake up.
Meeting you by chance is what I wish for.
If you encounter difficulties, please contact the New Erito Sheriff's Department.
Nice to meet you, I am Magistrate Tsing Yi. What is your specific request for booking community service at the Sheriff's Bureau? (Autopilot mode)
You, are you actually a good person?!
(Qing Yi's favor towards you has increased)
(Qing Yi's favor towards you has decreased)
Distributed virtual architecture interface encapsulation, HDD one-way slave Stand By——[NewLine] connection, start!
As the saying goes, those who do evil will eventually perish.
I'll treat you to tea next time.
If I have offended you in any way, I apologize for the inconvenience.
Your army is not as good as it used to be.

Qing Yi is a rookie detective of the Criminal Investigation Special Service Team. She is not a native human being, but a fictitious personality shaped by the ancient cultural texts of the old civilization. Qing Yi's body is an intelligent structure made of biological materials, commonly known as "Yuou". She was recommended to the Public Security Bureau by the Westa Institute and assigned as Zhu Yuan's partner as a rookie detective. Qing Yi always behaves in an open-minded and leisurely manner like an elder. She acts more casually and is not bound by rules. Compared with modern people who are influenced by the current society, Qing Yi can often come up with many unexpected solutions to problems.

Qingyi carries a water cup with her and takes a few sips from time to time. "Drink more hot water, it's good for your health~][NewLine] Tip: Being with Qingyi is also like madly testing the edge of danger, please always remember your identity as a "rope maker".

The scientific name of Qing Yi is: 01 Neo-Genesis VI (01 Origin Type Sixth Generation Body). This code is attached somewhere on Qing Yi's original body, and the abbreviation is: O1NG VI. [NewLine] The researchers of the Wishtar Institute who discovered her transformed this string of characters into: QING YI, and thus called her "Qing Yi".
If you don’t like Tsing Yi, get out!

Each combat unit killed will receive a bonus of [ICON_GOLD] gold coins equal to 100% of its [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength. [NewLine] War-weariness accumulation is reduced by 50%. After declaring a war of liberation, a war to defend a city-state, a war to recover lost territory, or a war being declared, +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and [ICON_GOLD] gold coins will be added within 15 rounds. Ether material rations equal to the rank will be obtained, and each city will also provide 1 ether material each round. [NewLine] An annual assessment will be conducted in the new era. By increasing the basic bonus of the rank, you can choose a medal. Different medals will provide different basic bonuses when increasing the rank, and you will also receive a bonus equal to a certain percentage of the comprehensive assessment score. [NewLine] The comprehensive assessment score depends on the total number of units killed by the civilization, the total livability of the entire city, and the happiness of all residents in the city (the current assessment score and the target score of this era will be displayed in the corresponding interface)
Combat unit maintenance cost -2, [ICON_GOLD] gold and resources required for upgrade -50%
Green as ice in a jade pot
Intelligent structure based on biological materials, scientific name 01 original sixth generation element
Good Ears and Good Eyes Medal: This unit's [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route cannot be raided by enemy units
Medal for Public Service: Killing Barbarians will gain experience points normally, and +7 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength in the territory
Gavel: Gain additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power based on the enemies killed. The upper limit of this additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power will increase with the progress of Yuou transformation

Qianqiu Sui: Unit attacks will cause 5 lightning damage to surrounding enemies, and accumulate "Flashover" according to the damage caused. At the beginning of the next round, the accumulated 50 "Flashover" will be converted into "Drunken Flower Moon Cloud Turn"
"Drunken Flowers, Moon and Clouds": Causes 125% damage, knocks back the target and clears the opponent's [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement, making it enter "Detention" this round
"Steady Arc Barrier": Recover 50% of non-fatal damage received, rebound 10 + 50% of damage received (this damage can accumulate "Flashover"), lasts for 1 round

Drink more hot water: +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement, automatically recover 15 health points at the end of the round, the effect is improved when near a water source at the beginning of the round, the effect is improved when near a volcano, and it is greatly improved when near both

Extraordinary Meridians: +20 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, +3 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement, +1 Attacks, Can still move after attacking, can still attack after moving, can walk on flat ground, can consume "Flashover" to release "Bound"
If you encounter difficulties, [NewLine] please contact the New Elido Police Department
